definitions.definition: buried within or built into a wall, whether respectfully (as with shrines, monuments, or tombs) or as torture (if buried alive).
trapped or captured (within the surrounding matrix).
labels: of impurities in a growing crystal
definitions.label_groups: crystallography and geology , of impurities in a growing crystal
